availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James A. Chase (Simpson County, Kentucky, minister)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, Presbyterian minister. Kentucky native. Married to Susan J. Chase. Father of William H. Chase, Robert H. Chase, and Virgil C. Chase. Presbyterian minister in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Presbyterian minister in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 178B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 4.
Find A Grave, "Rev. James A. Chase Jr. (1822-1893)," Memorial #132159979, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/132159979(accessed August 24, 2020).
